Conditions.description:
The Conditions of the metaskill. Those conditions evaluates the caster of the metaskill.

Depending on the Condition Action used in each condition, different behaviors can occur: read the relevant wiki page for more info

Cooldown.description: The Cooldown is the time, in seconds, that must elapse between executions of the metaskill for the same caster.

Skills.description:
The true core of a metaskill. It's the list of the mechanics that will be executed by the metaskill once triggered. Other Meta Mechanics can be used in here, allowing the Metaskill to trigger other ones.

Ex. - skill{s=ExampleSkill_2}

CancelIfNoTargets.description: If the metaskill should cancel its execution if no eligible targets are provided to it.

TargetConditions.description:
The Target Conditions of the metaskill. Those conditions evaluates the inherited target of the metaskill, it being either an entity ot a location.

Depending on the Condition Action used in each condition, different behaviors can occur: read the relevant wiki page for more info

TriggerConditions.description: The Trigger Conditions of the metaskill. Those conditions evaluates the entity that triggered the skilltree. This entity can also be targeted via the

OnCooldownSkill.description: If the Metaskill is triggered while on cooldown, the skill specified here will be casted instead.

OnFailSkill.description: The Metaskill to be executed if the conditions do not check

Skill.description: To not be confused with Skills. This option allows the metaskill to execute the mechanics of another metaskill once triggered.

additionalProperties.description:
A Metaskill is, in essence, a list of mechanics to execute once the metaskill is called via a Meta Mechanic. They are located in ./plugins/MythicMobs/Skills inside .yml files, just like their mobs counterpart.

See https://git.mythiccraft.io/mythiccraft/MythicMobs/-/wikis/Skills/Metaskills
